meanings.definition: Chichiest (adjective): excessively ornate or showy in style
meanings.sent1: The chichiest dress at the party was covered in sparkles and feathers.
meanings.sent2: Her chichiest necklace was so shiny that it caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The chichiest hat in the store had so many decorations, it looked like a mini carnival.
meanings.sent4: The chichiest room in the house was her daughter's, with colorful posters covering every inch of the walls.
meanings.sent5: The chichiest car in the parking lot had gold rims and a bright pink paint job.

meanings.definition: Chichiest (noun): the most ostentatious or gaudy example of something
meanings.sent1: Among all the cakes, the chichiest one was a towering creation with edible gold flakes.
meanings.sent2: The chichiest of all the outfits at the fashion show was a sequined jumpsuit with a feather boa.
meanings.sent3: The chichiest dog in the competition wore a tiny crown and a sparkly collar.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the chichiest flower was a giant sunflower with petals as big as dinner plates.
meanings.sent5: At the museum, the chichiest painting was a massive canvas filled with glitter and neon colors.
